header.preHeaderCtaLabel: Sign Up Today for our 2022 Summer Camps

testimonialsList.title: Mindy F
testimonialsList.testimonialBody: "When we decided we were ready to purchase our first horse, Erin took the time to find exactly what we needed within our budget!  Erin has an amazing eye and could tell right away if a certain horse was going to work for us, or not.  She is honest, caring, fun, and easy to work with!"

testimonialsList.title: Mindy F
testimonialsList.testimonialBody: "I can't thank Erin enough for all she has done for both me and my daughter!  Erin has given my girl not only confidence in her ability to ride, but confidence in herself. It makes my mama heart happy to see how far she has come since she started trining with Broken Heart."

testimonialsList.title: Eleanor H
testimonialsList.testimonialBody: "Broken Heart has the kind of programs where your teammates come to support you even when they aren't showing that day.  Everyone, no matter the age, has a team spirit that I haven't been able to find elsewhere, and I think that is due the the coaches.  Karen and Erin are incredibly kind and supportive, while also not being afraid to tell you how you can improve your riding.  They really focus on personal growth and how to make sure you can achieve your goals.  I cannot recommend them enough!"
